final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    A[Incoming call] --> B[Call registration]
    B --> |XOR| C{XORGateway}
    C --> D[Complaint analysis]
    C --> E[External referral with form B4]
    C --> F[Internal referral with form B2]
    D --> G[Contact complainant]
    G --> H[Archiving system]
    H --> I[close case]
    E --> |Parallel| J{ParallelGateway}
    F --> |Parallel| J
    J --> K[Telephone confirmation to external party]
    J --> L[Archiving system]
    J --> M[Incident agenda]
    K --> |XOR| N{XORGateway}
    L --> N
    N --> |Parallel| O{ParallelGateway}
    M --> O
    O --> P[Inform complainant]
    P --> Q[case closed]
